<script id="suiviTemplate" type="text/x-handlebars-template">

	{{#with shipment}}

		

{{setVar "goToBasile" "false"}}


        {{#iterTimeLineByID timeline}}
            {{#checkWatchChatBotOpen ../../shipment '[DESOBS, DISMAD, DISINS]'}}
                {{setVar "goToBasile" "true"}}
                {{setVar "environment" "prod"}}
            {{/checkWatchChatBotOpen}}
        {{/iterTimeLineByID}}
    <!-- Shipment Methods -->
<section class="methods-container">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="methods__ship-id">
            <p>
                        N°{{formatIdShipment  idShip}}
                    </p>
                
            {{#if contextData.partner}}
            {{#ifMultiple contextData.partner.reference '!=' ''}}
            {{#ifMultiple contextData.partner.reference '!=' null}}
            <p class="information-label">N° de suivi étranger : N°{{contextData.partner.reference}}</p>
            {{/ifMultiple}}
            {{/ifMultiple}}
            {{/if}}
        </div>
        <div class="methods__list">
            <img src="https://www.laposte.fr/_ui/eboutique/images/logo/{{holder this}}.svg" alt={{holder this}}>
            <p class="product">{{product}}</p>
            {{#hasMerchantInformations contextData}}
                 <p>&nbsp;expédié par&nbsp;</p>
                 {{#ifCond contextData.merchantLogo}}
                    <img src="{{contextData.merchantLogo}}"/>
                 {{else}}
                      {{#ifCond contextData.merchantName}}
                           <p>{{convertToSpecialCharacters contextData.merchantName}}</p>
                      {{/ifCond}}
                 {{/ifCond}}
            {{/hasMerchantInformations}}
        </div>
        {{#ifCond contextData.deliveryMode}}
            <div class="methods__delivery">
                <p>{{contextData.deliveryMode}}</p>
            </div>
        {{/ifCond}}

        <div class="register-shipment">
            
                    {{#ifMultiple isFinal '==' false}}
                        <a class="save-link" href="https://www.laposte.fr/espaceclient/save/{{idShip}}">
                                    <i class="lpi-ic_24dp_save"></i>
                                </a>
                            
                    {{/ifMultiple}}
                </div>

    </div>
</section>


{{#if message}}

<script type="text/javascript">
	document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {

		

			


		var params = "";
		if (tc_vars['page_IDH'] && tc_vars['page_IDH'] != '' ) {
			params += 'cms_page='+tc_vars['page_IDH'];
		}
		if (tc_vars['product_code'] && tc_vars['product_code'] != '' ) {
			params += '&product_code='+tc_vars['product_code'];
		}
		if (tc_vars['category_code'] && tc_vars['category_code'] != '' ) {
			params += '&category_code='+tc_vars['category_code'];
		}
		if (tc_vars['store_locator'] && tc_vars['store_locator'] != '' ) {
			params += '&store_locator='+tc_vars['store_locator'];
		}

		if (tc_vars['functionnality'] && tc_vars['functionnality'] != '' ) {
			params += 'functionnality='+tc_vars['functionnality'];
		}
		if (tc_vars['stepNumber'] && tc_vars['stepNumber'] != '' ) {
			params += '&stepNumber='+tc_vars['stepNumber'];
		}

		ajaxShowCart('/ajax/tagco?buster='+new Date().getTime()+'&'+params , function(data){
			// eval response
			//eval(data);
			if (data) {
				try{
					// Create the element
					var script = document.createElement("script");
					// Add script content
					script.innerHTML = data;
					// Append
					document.head.appendChild(script);
					// get and create global vars
					globalUserData = userData;
					globalTcVarsAjax = tc_vars_ajax;// update the tagco variables
					for (var attr in tc_vars_ajax) {
						tc_vars[attr]=tc_vars_ajax[attr];
					}
                    if(tc_vars.page_IDH !== 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step1' &&
                       tc_vars.page_IDH !== 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step2' &&
                       tc_vars.page_IDH !== 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step3'){
                        loadScript(scriptUrl1 , function(){ window.dispatchEvent(createCrossEvent('tagco-loaded')); });
                        if(tc_vars.env_work !== 'prod'){
                            if (scriptUrl5 !=='undefined'){
                                loadScript(scriptUrl5, function () {
                                });
                            }
                        }
                    }

                    if(tc_vars.page_IDH === 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step1' ||
                       tc_vars.page_IDH === 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step2' ||
                       tc_vars.page_IDH === 'mobile-inscription-pro-Step3'){
                        loadScript(scriptUrl7 , function(){ });
                    }

                    loadScript(scriptUrl6 , function(){ });
                    loadScript(scriptUrl4 , function(){ });
					loadScript(scriptUrl2 , function(){ });
					loadScript(scriptUrl3 , function(){ });
				} catch(error) {
					console.error('Run ajax before loadScript TC', error);
				}
			}
		});

	});
</script>

    <script>
    jQuery('.faq-q').click(function(){
        if (jQuery(this).siblings().find('.faq-a').is(':visible')) {
            jQuery(this).removeClass('faq-q-open');
            jQuery(this).siblings().find('.faq-a').removeClass('faq-a-open').slideUp();
    }
    else {
        jQuery(this).addClass('faq-q-open');
        jQuery(this).siblings().find('.faq-a').addClass('faq-a-open').slideDown();
        }
    })
    </script>
